description: [``botocore``] Documentation-only updates for IVS Chat API Reference.
[``botocore``] Lambda releases NodeJs 16 managed runtime to be available in all commercial regions.
[``botocore``] Amazon Kendra now provides a data source connector for Jira. For more information, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/kendra/latest/dg/data-source-jira.html
[``botocore``] AWS Transfer Family now accepts ECDSA keys for server host keys
[``botocore``] Documentation update for China region ListMetricValues for IoT
[``botocore``] Increased the character limit of the login message from 600 to 850 characters.
[``botocore``] We've now deprecated CreateSnapshot permission for creating a data view, instead use CreateDataView permission.
[``botocore``] This release adds support to include inactive database bundles in the response of the GetRelationalDatabaseBundles request.

[``botocore``] This release introduces a target type Gateway Load Balancer Endpoint for mirrored traffic. Customers can now specify GatewayLoadBalancerEndpoint option during the creation of a traffic mirror target.
[``botocore``] Adding support for dynamic SSM Runbook parameter values. Updating validation pattern for engagements. Adding ConflictException to UpdateReplicationSet API contract.
